Package io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider

Class EntityLootProviderBase

java.lang.Object
io.github.noeppi_noeppi.libx.data.provider.EntityLootProviderBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
net.minecraft.data.DataProvider
public abstract class EntityLootProviderBase extends Object implements net.minecraft.data.DataProvider
A base class for entity loot providers. An extending class should call the customLootTable methods in setup to adjust the loot tables.

      Combines the given loot builders into one. (All loot builders will be applied).

    • combine

      public EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory combine​(EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory... loot)

    • random

      Combines the given loot builders into one. (One loot builder will be applied).

    • random

      public EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory random​(EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory... loot)
      Combines the given loot factories into one. (One loot factory will be applied).

    • first

      public net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.entries.LootPoolEntryContainer.Builder<?> first​(net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.entries.LootPoolEntryContainer.Builder<?>... loot)
      Combines the given loot builders into one. Only the first matching builder is applied.

    • first

      public EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory first​(EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory... loot)
      Combines the given loot factories into one. Only the first matching factory is applied.

    • whileMatch

      public net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.entries.LootPoolEntryContainer.Builder<?> whileMatch​(net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.entries.LootPoolEntryContainer.Builder<?>... loot)
      Combines the given loot builders into one. From all the loot entries until the first one not matching, one is selected.

    • whileMatch

      public EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory whileMatch​(EntityLootProviderBase.LootFactory... loot)
      Combines the given loot factories into one. From all the loot factories until the first one not matching, one is selected.

    • defaultBehavior

      @Nullable protected net.minecraft.world.level.storage.loot.LootTable.Builder defaultBehavior​(net.minecraft.world.entity.EntityType<?> e)
      Creates a default loot table for the given entity. Can be overridden to alter default behaviour. Should return null if no loot table should be generated.
